content: Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI) is a system built by Daniel Miessler for personal use, which he has open-sourced.

To learn about Daniel Miessler's Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI), one can refer to his blog post 'Building a Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI)' or his YouTube video 'Building Your Own Unified AI Assistant Using Claude Code'.
Key components of Daniel Miessler's AI infrastructure include Claude Code, the Fabric AI Framework, and the Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI) project.
